settings.custom_liquid:
Convenience & bargain shopping and authenticity

JA Fashion & Co. is a family owned business with a big mission to make your access to luxury goods simple and affordable.  Along with exceptional prices, our platform offers only handpicked, beautiful, and trendy (new & pre-loved) items that will last and fashionable for years to come.

We pass on savings of up to 70%-90% to you. In addition, our prices are lower than in outlet or online stores offering exclusively pre-owned items at higher prices.

JA Fashion Co — with the best conditions on the resale market not only for buying but also for selling your items.

WHY US?

Forget about wasting time searching for the most beautiful and on-trend luxury items! Our platform offers only beautiful, trendy new and pre owned items that will last and last for years to come.

Do you dream of shopping at prices lower than official boutiques? We pass on savings of up to 70%-90% to you. In addition, our prices are lower than in outlet or online stores offering exclusively pre-owned items at higher prices. Each luxury item you receive in our branded packaging and set, as in an official boutique.

JA Fashion & Co. — with the best conditions on the resale market not only for buying but also for selling your items: • Our base fee is only 30% for items under $5000. You keep 70%. • For items over $5000, the fee is just 25%. You keep 75%. • Consignments have a minimum term of 90 days. — We would be glad to see you among our satisfied and returning customers!

settings.heading: Where are you based out of?
settings.row_content: Our headquarters are located in the City of Industry, California.

settings.heading: Where do you get your inventory from?
settings.row_content:
Our inventory is mostly sourced brand new from outlets and wholesalers.
Some items are pre-owned from clients and consignments.

settings.heading: How can I contact customer service?
settings.row_content:
You can contact us via our webpage and chat applications.
Via Email: contact@jafashionco.com
Via Instagram: jafandco

settings.heading: Does JAF charge sales tax?
settings.row_content: Sales tax is calculated at checkout based on the current tax rate for the zip code displayed on your shipping address.

settings.heading: How do you guarantee authenticity?
settings.row_content:
Our team of in-house experts are thoroughly trained and equipped to examine all items that we receive in order to determine its authenticity. We are proud to say that we have never sold a fake! On top of this, we guarantee the authenticity of every item we sell, or we will give you 100% of your money back - ensuring your trust is our top priority.
We offer a lifetime guarantee of authenticity on all our items, which means if your item was ever deemed non-authentic by a reputable authenticator with proof then JAF will provide you with a prepaid return label and issue a full refund.

settings.heading: Can I cancel an order that I have placed?
settings.row_content: Yes, you can cancel an order within 6 hours as long as it has not been processed yet for shipment. Please note there is a 3% restocking fee if the payment has already been completed.

settings.heading: Are your items new?
settings.row_content: The majority of our items are brand new, but we also carry pre-loved items in excellent condition.

settings.heading: How does your refund policy work?
settings.row_content: JA Fashion & Co offers a 14-day return policy, subject to terms and conditions. Please check our refund policy for more details.

settings.heading: Do we ship to P.O. Boxes?
settings.row_content: We understand that you may want an item shipped to a P.O. Box, but in order to reduce any online security issues we are not shipping to P.O. Boxes at this time.

settings.heading: How long does it take to receive my item after I have paid for it?
settings.row_content: Our processing time is 2 business days, and shipping can vary from 2-7 business days within the US. International shipping can vary from 5-10 business days.

settings.heading: What if my package is lost?
settings.row_content: All packages with a JAF-provided shipping label are tracked and insured. In the event of a lost package, please contact us by chat or email at contact@jafashionco.com for assistance.

settings.heading: Do you offer international shipping?
settings.row_content: Yes, we offer international shipping, which typically takes about 3-7 business days from the order date. We primarily use FedEx, but may also use DHL or UPS based on the destination. Please be aware that JAF does not cover import duties, goods and services tax (GST), value-added tax (VAT), customs fees, or any other taxes that may apply in addition to the purchase price. Delivery times may be affected by factors such as customs clearance. Additionally, items made from exotic materials cannot be shipped outside the US. All shipments will be tracked and insured.

settings.custom_liquid:
ANY QUESTIONS?

We're always here to help every customer. Please feel free to message us if you have any questions, and we will get back to you promptly.

CONTACT US
